title: Tesla Begins Robotaxi Rides in Austin Without Safety Drivers
description: Tesla is removing the safety driver from its robotaxis in Austin, kicking competition in the self-driving cab market into higher gear. Regina Clewlow, managing director at mobility analytics firm Populus, discusses the news and consumer readiness for self-driving cars with Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow on "Bloomberg Tech." (Source: Bloomberg)
